bug.author: zqjxw73
bug.summary: Can not fetch boost source code.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
The boost source can not be fetched using the current URL in ray_deps_setup.bzl file, I think need to find another mirror website to replace it. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Simply access this URL in your browser (<denchmark-link:https://dl.bintray.com/boostorg/release/1.71.0/source/boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2>https://dl.bintray.com/boostorg/release/1.71.0/source/boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2</denchmark-link> ), and it will show a forbidden error. If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
